movie_title: Man vs beast: Who is more efficient? - 6 Minute English
introduction: Humans are considered the superior species on Earth, but are our bodies as efficient as the bodies o

vocabulary.definition: the best age or the age at which you are most likely to succeed
vocabulary.example: Athletes have to find their optimal age for peak performance in their sport.

vocabulary.definition: bent at the knee, leaning forward, and closer to the ground
vocabulary.example: The sprinter started in a crouched position before racing towards the finish line.

vocabulary.definition: to decrease in quality or quantity
vocabulary.example: The quality of service tends to drop off during peak hours at the restaurant.

vocabulary.definition: the best possible combination of factors or circumstances
vocabulary.example: The chef found the sweet spot of spices that made the dish incredibly flavorful.

vocabulary.definition: something which has a bent shape, especially a sharp bend in a road or path
vocabulary.example: The hiking trail led us through a series of doglegs, making the journey more interesting.

vocabulary.definition: the amount of muscle in your body, as opposed to fat or bone
vocabulary.example: Weightlifters focus on increasing their muscle mass to enhance strength and power.
